Class Sound

  • java.lang.Object
    • ev3dev.hardware.Device
      • ev3dev.hardware.EV3DevDevice
        • ev3dev.hardware.actuators.Sound
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SupportedPlatform, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class Sound
extends EV3DevDevice
    Class that provides access methods for the local audio device

      • playTone

        public void playTone(int frequency,
                     int duration,
                     int volume)
        Plays a tone, given its frequency and duration.
        Parameters:
        frequency - The frequency of the tone in Hertz (Hz).
        duration - The duration of the tone, in milliseconds.
        volume - The volume of the playback 100 corresponds to 100%

      • playTone

        public void playTone(int frequency,
                     int duration)
        Plays a tone, given its frequency and duration.
        Parameters:
        frequency - The frequency of the tone in Hertz (Hz).
        duration - The duration of the tone, in milliseconds.

      • playSample

        public int playSample(java.io.File file,
                      int vol)
        Play a wav file. Must be mono, from 8kHz to 48kHz, and 8-bit or 16-bit.
        Parameters:
        file - the 8-bit or 16-bit PWM (WAV) sample file
        vol - the volume percentage 0 - 100
        Returns:
        The number of milliseconds the sample will play for or less 0 if there is an error.

      • playSample

        public int playSample(java.io.File file)
        Play a wav file. Must be mono, from 8kHz to 48kHz, and 8-bit or 16-bit.
        Parameters:
        file - the 8-bit or 16-bit PWM (WAV) sample file
        Returns:
        The number of milliseconds the sample will play for or less 0 if there is an error.

        Set the master volume level
